text: __NOTOC__ Nkx2-2as (Nkx2-2 antisense) is a long non-coding RNA. It is located in the cytoplasm of the cell. Nkx2-2as is involved in Neural development. Overexpression of Nkx2-2as results in increased levels of expression of the homeobox gene Nkx2-2 and enhances induction of the differentiation of oligodendrocytes. Besides Nkx2-2, Nkx2-2as may also regulate the expression of other genes. == See also == * Long non-coding RNA == References == == Further reading == * == External links == * MGI entry for Nkx2-2as Category:Non-coding RNA
title: Nkx2-2as
